result.execSummary:
The defendant Kai Chang was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Child Abuse-Intentionally Cause Harm [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.03(2)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Complete any assessment, treatment, counseling deemed necessary by agent.  Complete AODA with follow through.  DNA sample.

**INCLUDES 14CM1432, 14CF931, 13CF920, 15CF540

Clerk: Kimberly
Case called: 10:42am
INCLUDES 13CF920, 14CF931, 14CM1432, 15CF540
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Defendant appears in person, in custody, with Atty Dana Norgard.
Date and time set for SAR in 13CF920 & 14CM1432, revoking DEOJ in 14CF931, and plea in 15CF540

State gives stipulated recommendation for sentencing on all files

Plea 15CF540:
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
Ct. 2 Maintain Drug Trafficking place, PTAC >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping-Felony- repeater to DELETE "repeater" enhancer
Ct. 4 Possess Drug Paraphernalia- repeater >> D&RI
COURT grants above
PLEA: 
Ct. 1 Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense) >> NO CONTEST 
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping- Felony >> NO CONTEST
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: On Ct. 1- 3 and half years WSPS: 18 months IC, 2 years ES. On Ct. 3- 4 years WSPS- 2 years IC, 2 years ES. Concurrent to all sentencing in 13CF920 Ct. 1, 14CM1432 Ct. 1 & Ct. 2, and 14CF931 Ct. 1. Credit granted for 387 days credit. 

COURT ORDERS: 13CF920 Ct. 1 - 3 and half years WSPS: 18 months IC, 2 years ES. Concurrent to all sentencing in 14CM1432 Ct. 1 & Ct. 2, 14CF931 Ct. 1, and 15CF540 Ct. 1 & Ct. 3. Credit granted for 614 days. 
COURT ORDERS: 14CM1432 Ct. 1 & Ct. 2- 2 years WSPS: 1 year IC, 1 year ES. Concurrent to all sentencing in 13CF920 Ct. 1, 14CF931 Ct. 1, and 15CF540 Ct. 1 & Ct. 3. Credit granted for 614 days. 
COURT ORDERS: 14CF931 Ct. 1- 3 and half years WSPS: 18 months IC, 2 years ES. Concurrent to all sentencing in 13CF920 Ct. 1, 14CM1432 Ct. 1 & Ct. 2, and 15CF540 Ct. 1 & Ct. 3. Credit granted for 132 days.
CONDITIONS OF ES FOR ALL SENTENCING: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Pay CC. Pay DNA sample and surcharge in 15CF540. Deft is eligible for both prison programming- Challeng Incarceration & Substance Abuse. 

Deft remanded to MC Sheriff's Dept to be transported to Dodge County.

Case Called: 2:32pm. INCLUDES 14CF931, 14CM1432. Clerk: Denise.  State appears by ADA Lisa Gramer. Deft appears in person w/Atty Dana Norgard. State recites agreement. Atty Norgard makes statement. OTR @ 2:35pm. BOTR @ 2:42pm. State continues with agreement. Atty Norgard makes statement.  *VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to DRI ct 2 (bj/repeater) 14CF931- crt grants. PLEA: NO CONTEST - ct 1 (child abuse/intentional/repeater) 14CF931; ct 1 (battery/repeater); ct 2 (dc/repeater) 14CM1432. Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty on cts 1 & 2 in 14CM1432 and deferred in ct 1 14CF931. Statements by State. COURT ORDERS: 14CM1432- SWH - 2 yrs probation, concurrrent to each other. CONDITIONS: Counseling; Treatment; Absolute Sobriety - Drugs & Alcohol; No contact with G.C. and K.C. dob 5/22/00; 20 hrs Community Service; Good faith effort to obtain and maintain fulltime employment and/or school; Court Costs; DNA Surcharge.  COURT ORDERS: 14CF931 - DEOJ - 2 yrs. Crt adopts & signs Deferred Entry Agreement. DATES: Review Hearing - 10/26/16 @ 1:10pm -to set Sentencing Hearing in 6 months. State makes statement regarding credit. 0 days credit at this time. Atty Norgard makes further statements. Adjourned: 3:02pm.
